path.description: Path to the directory containing the Kustomization file.

outPath.description: OutPath is the file path to write the built manifests to.

plugin.description: Plugin contains configuration for customizing the behavior of builtin Kustomize plugins.

helm.description: Helm contains configuration for inflating a Helm chart.

apiVersions.description: APIVersions allows a manual set of supported API versions to be passed when inflating a Helm chart.

kubeVersion.description: KubeVersion allows for passing a specific Kubernetes version to use when inflating a Helm chart.
